episodes.title: Good Luck, Father Ted
episodes.plot: Father Dougal and Jack visit a Craggy Island fair filled with odd attractions, while Father Ted secretly tries to have a TV interview with "Faith Of Our Fathers".

episodes.title: Entertaining Father Stone
episodes.plot: The always at a loss for words, Father Stone, visits Craggy Island and over stays his welcome.

episodes.title: The Passion of Saint Tibulus
episodes.plot: Father Ted and Dougal protest a blasphemous new film on the orders of a visiting Bishop with a terrible secret.

episodes.title: Competition Time
episodes.plot: Father Ted, Dougal and Jack enter a talent competition visited by a BBC presenter with an odd drinking problem.

episodes.title: And God Created Woman
episodes.plot: Father Ted struggles with a crush he has for a lady visitor, and the arrival of a group of nuns.

episodes.title: Grant Unto Him Eternal Rest
episodes.plot: Father Jack dies after drinking floor polish, leaving Ted and Dougal an inheritance.
